IRS990EZ.PrimaryExemptPurposeTxt: TO SUPPORT CINCINNATI 501(C)(3) CHARITABLE ORGANIZATIONS, THE ORGANIZATION ACCEPTS DONATIONS OF USED CLOTHING AND SELLS ITEMS TO RAISE FUNDS THAT ARE DISTRIBUTED TO CINCINNATI 501(C)(3) PUBLIC CHARITIES. CLOTHING AND OTHER ITEMS RECEIVED THAT ARE NOT HELD FOR RESALE ARE GIVEN TO OTHER CINCINNATI 501(C)(3) CHARITABLE ORGANIZATIONS FOR USE BY THESE ORGANIZATIONS.

ProgramSrvcAccomplishmentGrp.DescriptionProgramSrvcAccomTxt: CASH CONTRIBUTIONS TO CINCINNATI CHARITABLE 501(C)(3) ORGANIZATIONS (PROCEEDS FROM DONATED CLOTHING SALES)
DONATION OF DONATED CLOTHING AND OTHER ITEMS RECEIVED BUT NOT HELD FOR RESALE. (FREESTORE, PHILABUS CHURCH AND MATTHEW 25)
